Feature.Description: Allows to initialise a pump (e.g. by executiong a reference move). The initialisation has to be successful in order for the pump to work correctly and dose fluids. If the initialisation fails, the StandardExecutionError InitialisationFailed is thrown.

Command.Description: Initialize the pump drive (e.g. by executing a reference move).

Response.Description: A boolean value where false represents a failed initialisation and true represents a successful initialisation.

StandardExecutionError.Description: The initialisation did not end properly.
